downloadTitle: HPC - Technical Overview of Windows HPC Server 2008 R2
downloadDescription: Overview of new features and capabilites in the Windows HPC Server 2008 R2 solution, including SP1, SP2, and SP3.
detailsSection:
This white paper provides an overview of Windows® HPC Server 2008 R2, including a list of new features, an overview of the Microsoft® HPC solution (including hardware and software requirements), and an overview of key capabilities in the areas of deployment, system management, job scheduler, runtime for Service Oriented Architectures (SOA), message-passing interface (MPI) and networking, Microsoft Office Excel® 2010 support, and security.

This paper includes updates for features that were added in Service Pack 1, Service Pack 2, and Service Pack 3.
installInstructionSection: To start the download, click the Download button.
